document.full_text: gov. jan brewer, a republican, said on monday that she would petition the u.s. supreme court to lift an injunction blocking some portions of arizona's controversial immigration law.
document.title: southwest: arizona: governor will appeal to supreme court
lines_and_colors: gov. jan brewer, a republican, said on monday that she would petition the u.s. supreme court to lift an injunction blocking some portions of arizona's controversial immigration law.
